name: SpecifyNothing
description: The specification is not done intentionally. Programmers are expected to work better without written specifications.

configuration.configPrintName: Minimum number of wiki pages with project specification
configuration.configErrorMess: Minimum number of wikipages must be positive integer number

configuration.configPrintName: Minimum number of activities with project specification
configuration.configErrorMess: Minimum number of activities with project specification must be positive integer number

configuration.configPrintName: Minimum average length of activity description
configuration.configDescription: Minimum average number of character of activity description
configuration.configErrorMess: Minimum average length of activity description must be positive integer number

configuration.configDescription: Substring that will be search in wikipages and activities
configuration.configErrorMess: Maximum number of substrings is ten and must not starts and ends with characters ||
